name: ClimbPress
author: Edward Bock

sections.description:
Alpha Version – Route management for climbing and boulder gyms.

Things may change on the way to first stable version 1.0.

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
1. Upload climbpress.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Extract the Plugin to a climbpress Folder
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is there developer documentation?

Not yet, but I’m working on it.

Can I use my own grading system?

As I know that a lot of climbing gyms use own climbing scales, it is possible to add custom scales. There is currently no interface for that and has to be done right in the database. An interface for that will be provided shortly. Till then ask your developer or contact me for more information on how to do that.
sections.changelog:
0.7.0

  • Feature: Route pagination and filters
  • Feature: Export honors current route table filters
  • Check: WordPress 6.5.0 compatible

0.6.2

  • Check: WordPress 6.4.3 compatible
  • Package updates

0.6.1

  • Optimization: UX Update to backend votings diagramm
  • Optimization: Community votings in frontend

0.6.0

  • Feature: Community voting system for routes

0.5.0

  • Feature: climbpress-routes web component got more properties
  • Feature: New user role climbpress_manager

0.4.1

  • Bugfix: Gutenberg error because _ document overwrites lodash

0.4.0

  • Feature: Slots and theme templates for climbpress-routes web component
  • Optimization: Backend UI/UX

0.3.1

  • Optimization: User interface design
  • Translation: German

0.3.0

  • Feature: CSV routes export
  • Breaking Change: Database changed to core route fields and flexible custom fields
  • Breaking Change: Moved namespace

0.2.0

  • Feature: Gutenberg block for frontend routes list

0.1.1

  • Fix: Escape php echos
  • Fix: Date on create route not working

0.1.0

  • Alpha Release
  • Basic database for route management
  • Rest API v1 routes
  • Rest API v1 grading systems
